languages.text: "Экипаж ненавидит ксеноса. Обычно я пресекаю разговоры на постах, но только последняя сволочь не даст людям от души попроклинать нелюдя".
languages.translation_comment:
Completed Marazhai's first quest (to save him, after he slaughetered crew in a panicked frenzy, from daemons appearing on board).
Abelard: "I must tell you, Lord Captain, that the crew were... dismayed and confused to learn that your xenos was not sedated after his antics."

traits.locale_text: "Экипаж ненавидит ксеноса. Обычно я пресекаю разговоры на постах, но только последняя сволочь не даст людям от души попроклинать нелюдя".

languages.text: "The crew loathes the xenos. I usually put a stop to any chatter at the stations, but only a complete louse would cheat people out of cursing that scum to their heart's content."
languages.translation_comment:
Completed Marazhai's first quest (to save him, after he slaughetered crew in a panicked frenzy, from daemons appearing on board).
Abelard: "I must tell you, Lord Captain, that the crew were... dismayed and confused to learn that your xenos was not sedated after his antics."

"The crew loathes the xenos. I usually put a stop to any chatter at the stations, but only a complete louse would cheat people out of cursing that scum to their heart's content."

languages.text: 「乗組員たちはあの異種族を心底嫌っている。普段なら持ち場での雑談は止めさせるんだが、あのクズどもを思う存分罵る権利まで奪うような奴は、よっぽどのクズだろう」
languages.original_text: "The crew loathes the xenos. I usually put a stop to any chatter at the stations, but only a complete louse would cheat people out of cursing that scum to their heart's content."

traits.locale_text: 「乗組員たちはあの異種族を心底嫌っている。普段なら持ち場での雑談は止めさせるんだが、あのクズどもを思う存分罵る権利まで奪うような奴は、よっぽどのクズだろう」

languages.text: "Die Crew hasst den Xenos. Für gewöhnlich unterbinde ich jedes Gerede auf den Stationen, doch nur ein wahrer Schuft würde es den Leuten verwehren, diesen Abschaum nach Herzenslust zu verfluchen."
languages.original_text: "The crew loathes the xenos. I usually put a stop to any chatter at the stations, but only a complete louse would cheat people out of cursing that scum to their heart's content."

traits.locale_text: "Die Crew hasst den Xenos. Für gewöhnlich unterbinde ich jedes Gerede auf den Stationen, doch nur ein wahrer Schuft würde es den Leuten verwehren, diesen Abschaum nach Herzenslust zu verfluchen."

languages.text: « L'équipage hait les xénos. D'ordinaire, je n'autorise pas les bavardages aux postes, mais il faudrait être la dernière des charognes pour priver les gens du plaisir d'insulter cette vermine. »
languages.original_text: "The crew loathes the xenos. I usually put a stop to any chatter at the stations, but only a complete louse would cheat people out of cursing that scum to their heart's content."

traits.locale_text: « L'équipage hait les xénos. D'ordinaire, je n'autorise pas les bavardages aux postes, mais il faudrait être la dernière des charognes pour priver les gens du plaisir d'insulter cette vermine. »

languages.text: «La tripulación aborrece al xenos. Normalmente acostumbro a poner fin a los cuchicheos, pero solo un canalla sin escrúpulos les privaría de la satisfacción de increpar a esa escoria».
languages.original_text: "The crew loathes the xenos. I usually put a stop to any chatter at the stations, but only a complete louse would cheat people out of cursing that scum to their heart's content."

traits.locale_text: «La tripulación aborrece al xenos. Normalmente acostumbro a poner fin a los cuchicheos, pero solo un canalla sin escrúpulos les privaría de la satisfacción de increpar a esa escoria».

languages.text: “所有船员都憎恨异形。通常情况下，我会禁止船员在船上闲聊，但恐怕只有彻头彻尾的人渣才会巧言令色，制止人们尽情咒骂该死的异形渣滓。”
languages.original_text: "The crew loathes the xenos. I usually put a stop to any chatter at the stations, but only a complete louse would cheat people out of cursing that scum to their heart's content."

traits.locale_text: “所有船员都憎恨异形。通常情况下，我会禁止船员在船上闲聊，但恐怕只有彻头彻尾的人渣才会巧言令色，制止人们尽情咒骂该死的异形渣滓。”

languages.text: "Mürettebat, zenolardan nefret ediyor. Normalde istasyonlarda muhabbete göz yummam ama bu sefillere gönüllerince sövmelerini engelleyecek kadar adi değilim."
languages.original_text: "The crew loathes the xenos. I usually put a stop to any chatter at the stations, but only a complete louse would cheat people out of cursing that scum to their heart's content."
